description: Pulls all enemies to one row, preventing them from moving.
name: Immobilize
note:
<After Eval>
var row = target.row();
var members = target.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
for (var i = 0; i < members.length; ++i) {
  var member = members[i];
  if (member && member.row() !== row) {
    member.setRow(row);
  }
}
</After Eval>

description: Pilfers an item from an enemy.

description: Reveals detailed information about an enemy.
name: Libra
note:
<Before Eval>
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);

  var text = target.name() + '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]HP:\\c[0] ' + target.hp;
  text += '/' + target.mhp;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MP:\\c[0] ' + target.mp;
  text += '/' + target.mmp;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]TP:\\c[0] ' + target.tp;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]ATK:\\c[0] ' + target.atk;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MAT:\\c[0] ' + target.mat;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]AGI:\\c[0] ' + target.agi;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]DEF:\\c[0] ' + target.def;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MDF:\\c[0] ' + target.mdf;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]LUK:\\c[0] ' + target.luk;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
 
  var weakness = '';
  var resist = '';
  var immune = '';
  var absorb = '';
  var elements = $dataSystem.elements;
  for (var i = 1; i < elements.length; ++i) {
    var name = elements[i];
    var rate = target.elementRate(i);
    if (rate > 1) {
      weakness += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 0) {
      absorb += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate === 0) {
      immune += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 1) {
      resist += name + ' ';
    }
  }
  if (weakness === '') weakness = 'None';
  if (resist === '') resist = 'None';
  if (immune === '') immune = 'None';
  if (absorb === '') absorb = 'None';
  weakness = '\\c[4]Weakness:\\c[0] ' + weakness + '\n';
  resist = '\\c[4]Resist:\\c[0] ' + resist + '\n';
  immune = '\\c[4]Immune:\\c[0] ' + immune + '\n';
  absorb = '\\c[4]Absorb:\\c[0] ' + absorb;
  text = weakness + resist + immune + absorb;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
}
</Before Eval>

description: Restores some MP to the user.
name: Charge

description: Deals damage to all targets based upon time spent exploring.
name: Horology

description: Captures a HP-critical target for additional loot.
name: Poach
note:
<After Eval>
if (user.isActor() && target.isEnemy() && (target.isDead() || target.hp <= 0)) {
  var id = target.enemyId();
  var pool = [];
  pool.push($dataItems[1]);
  pool.push($dataItems[2]);
  pool.push($dataItems[3]);
  if (id === 1) {
    pool.push($dataWeapons[1]);
  } else if (id === 2) {
    pool.push($dataWeapons[2]);
    pool.push($dataWeapons[3]);
  } else if (id === 3) {
    pool.push($dataArmors[1]);
    pool.push($dataArmors[2]);
    pool.push($dataArmors[3]);
  }
  var item = pool[Math.floor(Math.random() * pool.length)];
  if (item) {
    target.startAnimation(2);
    target.removeImmortal();
    SoundManager.playShop();
    $gameParty.gainItem(item, 1);
    var msg = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + ' acquired \\i[' + item.iconIndex + ']' + item.name + ' from ' + target.name() + '!';
    var wait = 60;
    BattleManager.addText(msg, wait);
  }
}
</After Eval>

description: Consumes HP to deal damage to one enemy.
name: Souleater

description: Reduces one target's Magick Defense.
name: Shear

description: Confuses one target.
name: Charm

description: Reduces one target's Magick.
name: Addle

description: Deals a random amount of damage to random targets.
name: Numerology

description: Copies users status effects to target.
name: Stamp
note:
<Before Eval>
var states = user.states();
for (var i = 0; i < states.length; ++i) {
  var state = states[i];
  if state {
  user.collectedState = state.id;
  break;
  }
}
  var stateId = user.collectedState;
  target.addState(stateId);
</Before Eval>

description: Adds one elemental weakness to one enemy.
name: Achilles
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
{
  var actionElements = this.getItemElements();
  var matchingElements = [4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11];
  var condition = false;
  for (var i = 0; i < actionElements.length; ++i) {
    if (matchingElements.contains(actionElements[i])) {
      condition = true;
      break;
    }
  }
  if (condition) {
    var exposedState = 82;
    target.addState(exposedState);
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

description: Deal ranged damage with a melee weapon.
name: Telekenesis
